TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ConsoleShell extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class provides an entry point which is called by minishell's main to transfer control to Msh console host implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int Start (string bannerText, string helpText, string[] args);
.method public static hidebysig int32 Start(string bannerText, string helpText, string[] args) cil managed
Public Shared Function Start (bannerText As String, helpText As String, args As String()) As Integer
static member Start : string * string * string[] -> int

Docs.param: Banner text to be displayed by ConsoleHost
Help text for minishell. This is displayed on 'minishell -?'.
Docs.summary: Entry point in to ConsoleShell. This method is called by main of minishell.
Docs.returns: An integer value which should be used as exit code for the process.
